original_text: I let them make themselves unclean because of the offerings that they made. They burned their firstborn children in fire as sacrifices. I did that to make them afraid. I wanted them to know that I am the Lord.”
korean_text: 그들이 장자를 다 화제로 드리는 그 예물로 내가 그들을 더럽혔음은 그들을 멸망하게 하여 나를 여호와인 줄 알게 하려 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: I let them make themselves unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 스스로를 부정하게 만들도록 허락했다

sentences.original_text: because of the offerings that they made
They burned their firstborn children in fire
I did that to make them afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 두려워하게 하기 위해 그렇게 했다

sentences.original_text: I wanted them to know that I am the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 여호와인 것을 그들이 알게 하고 싶었다
